name: Pocket Solitaire FREE
description:
Classic Solitaire game in your pocket!

FEATURES
- Classic draw 1 and 3 cards + draw 2 cards
- Solution to solve a game with the minimum moves
- View your game replay to boost your score
- Highscore with game replay
- Support both iPhone (iPod Touch) and iPad retina display
- Change game background and card backs

• If you like FreeCell game, check out Pocket FreeCell FREE, which is also available on the AppStore.

• Bug reports or suggestions please mail to support@lightArtGames.com
